name: akimbo
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of arms or legs) stretched out fully: A man with arms akimbo is balancing an enormous metal dish on his head. The dancers balance on their behinds, arms and legs akimbo.
(of arms) bent at the elbows (= the middle part of the arms where they bend) with the hands on the hips: arms akimbo He stood, arms akimbo, refusing to move.
(of legs) far apart or bent outwards in an awkward way: legs akimbo The child sits with her legs akimbo under a tree.
More examplesFewer examplesShe rushes in arms akimbo, ready to hug anything that moves.They sprawl on the ground, their limbs akimbo.They stand arms and legs akimbo in bowling poses.He was stretched out on his back on the sofa, legs akimbo.
